mapper.select: SELECT * from eforces_netsign WHERE province=#{province} AND city=#{city} AND network=#{network} AND county=#{county}
select netsign.contractPath from eforces_netsign netsign where netsign.IncNumber = #{incNumber}
mapper.sql: id, IncNumber, signType, identityfont, identityback,identitynum, companyName, legalPerson, signPic, crtTime, province, city, network, county, userId, payType, payMoney, networkareacode, status,contractPath,contractStartTime,contractEndTime, delFlage, checkUserId, checkTime, default1, default2
mapper.delete: update eforces_netsign set delFlage = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into eforces_netsign (id, IncNumber, signType, identityfont, identityback, identitynum, companyName, legalPerson, signPic, crtTime, province, city, network, county, userId, payType, payMoney, networkareacode, status, contractPath, contractStartTime, contractEndTime, delFlage, checkUserId, checkTime, default1, default2 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identityfont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identitynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{network,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{networkareacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractstarttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{contractendtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delflage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
